name: Ghostwire: Tokyo Original Game Soundtrack
detailed_description: In Ghostwire: Tokyo, players tune into their sixth sense as they uncover the root of a supernatural conspiracy responsible for nearly all of Tokyo’s population vanishing in an instant. Now players can immerse themselves further in the beautifully haunted cityscape visited by creatures of myth and urban legend with the release of the Ghostwire: Tokyo’s original soundtrack composed by the talented Masatoshi Yanagi!
